tasks.mutation: mutation{ resource { address { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation{ resource { contact_point_type { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation{ resource { contact_point { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}

mutation mutateOrganizations($var: [IIoRestorecommerceOrganizationOrganization!]!){ resource { organization { Mutate( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
mutation{ fulfillment { fulfillment_courier { Mutate( input: { items: ${resource_list}, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}

mutation MutateManufacturers($var: [IIoRestorecommerceManufacturerManufacturer!]!){ catalog { manufacturer { Mutate( input: { items: $var, totalCount: 0, mode: CREATE } ) { status { key code message } } } }}
